## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have added/updated docstrings for new functions
- [ ] I have run linting (`make lint` or `npm run lint`)
- [ ] No new warnings or errors introduced

### Security
- [ ] I have not committed any secrets or credentials
- [ ] Input validation is in place where needed
- [ ] No SQL injection vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] No XSS vulnerabilities introduced

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests for my changes
- [ ] Coverage threshold is maintained (70%+)
- [ ] All existing tests still pass

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation
- [ ] CHANGELOG updated (if applicable)
- [ ] API documentation updated (if endpoints changed)
